long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AwareClock - Stay on Top of Your Time

Description:

AwareClock is a powerful time management extension that helps you stay aware of your daily and monthly available hours. Whether you need to stay on track with your work, study, or personal tasks, AwareClock ensures you’re always in control of your time.

Features:
	•	Daily & Monthly Time Tracking: Instantly see how much time is left for today and the entire month to stay on top of your goals.
	•	Pomodoro Timer: Boost your focus and productivity with the built-in Pomodoro technique, which divides work into intervals with short breaks to help you stay energized and productive.
	•	Intuitive Dashboard: A clean, easy-to-read dashboard shows your time stats, so you can quickly assess your progress.

Coming Soon: More features to enhance your time management experience!
